H0.text: On which Scottish island was former Labour party leader John Smith laid to rest. Isle of Skye

H1.text: On which Scottish island was former Labour party leader John Smith laid to rest. Isle of Arran

H2.text: On which Scottish island was former Labour party leader John Smith laid to rest. Isle of Mull

H3.text: On which Scottish island was former Labour party leader John Smith laid to rest. Iona

A4.text: The Abbey graveyard is also the final resting place of John Smith, the former Labour Party leader, who loved Iona.

A5.text: The Abbey graveyard is said to contain the graves of many early Scottish Kings, as well as Norse kings from Ireland and Norway.
